solution_line_template: Across Saturday and Sunday, Sally eats {sandwiches_saturday} + {sandwiches_sunday} = <<{sandwiches_saturday}+{sandwiches_sunday}={total_sandwiches}>>{total_sandwiches} sandwiches

Since each sandwich sues {pieces_per_sandwich} pieces of bread, Sally eats {total_sandwiches} * {pieces_per_sandwich} = <<{total_sandwiches}*{pieces_per_sandwich}={total_pieces_of_bread}>>{total_pieces_of_bread} pieces of bread
